name: Axxès SAS
goal:
In 2015 Axxès was founded by leading French motorway operation companies.
Starting from the implementation of the French TIS-PL (interoperable electronic HGV tolling) scheme, Axxès' remit is to develop and provide EETS and related services for the European commercial transport sector.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Directive 1999/62/EC and its revisions
- Directive 2010/40/EC and its revisions
- Directive 2004/52/EC and its revision
- Decision 2009/750/EC
- EU Mobility Package
- ITS Action Plan
